definition[0]: a valuable object that has been owned by a family for many years and that is passed from the older members to the younger members
definition[1]: an heirloom vegetable or plant is one of a kind that was first grown many years ago, and has now become rare or unusual
example[1]: They sell many kinds of heirloom seeds.
definition[2]: a valuable object that has been owned by a family for many years and that is passed, for example, from grandfather to father to son
example[2]: The clock is a family heirloom.
